Your requests

Regular Analysis

Participants will register their participation record in requester POD (request.ttl). Participants will give the requester viewer access to the data item/file. Before the request end date, the requester can read/query the data item/file anytime for their analysis. In this case, the requester knows who provide data by their SOLID ID. The participants can withdraw the permission, modify or delete data which is used in the analysis before the request end date.

Privacy-preserving Analysis

Participants will only give the requested data item(s) at the moment when they click PARTICIPATE button. In this case, participant's SOLID ID or any identifiable information will NOT be saved. Therefore, participants cannot modify or delete the data once they give to the request.
